Package com.dua3.utility.fx.controls

Class Controls

java.lang.Object
com.dua3.utility.fx.controls.Controls
public final class Controls extends Object
Utility class for creating and managing UI controls.

    • choiceMenu

      public static <T> ChoiceMenuBuilder<T> choiceMenu(Collection<T> values)
      Creates and returns a new instance of ChoiceMenuBuilder with the specified collection of values.

      Use an ObservableList for values to automatically update menu items.

      Type Parameters:
      T - The type of the elements in the collection.
      Parameters:
      values - The collection of values to be presented in the choice menu.
      Returns:
      A ChoiceMenuBuilder instance initialized with the given collection of values.
